keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will stand up for our environment and fight to improve air quality, working with local residents and businesses. I am passionate about conserving our wildlife and green spaces, for now and future generations.

I will work to improve transport links for Bristol East, connecting us to the rest of the city and surrounding areas. We need better integrated and sustainable bus and rail networks, as well as safe cycling and walking routes.

I will campaign for better homes for everyone, ensuring higher standards and greater energy efficiency. I want to see more good quality affordable homes for rent and more support for those looking to buy their own home.
